Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Dating: 2ND INTERMEDIATE PERIOD (not after); MIDDLE KINGDOM (not before)
Name: Bead
Description: Large pierced ceramic bead. Incompletely fired, it is made of a buff-coloured clay that became grey. Asymmetrical in shape, there are traces of white slip inside.
